name: estimator
description: Calculates expectation values of quantum operators.

circuits.description: One or more parameterized or non-parameterized QuantumCircuit preparing state Ψ.

observables.description: One or more observables H whose expectation values are evaluated.

parameters.description: Parameters of quantum circuits, specifying the order in which values will be bound.

circuit_indices.description: A list of circuit indices. It must have the same length as observable_indices and parameter_values.

observable_indices.description: A list of observable indices. It must have the same length as circuit_indices and parameter_values.

parameter_values.description: A list of concrete parameters to be bound for each circuit. If specified, it must have the same length as circuit_indices and observable_indices.

run_options.description: A collection of key-value pairs identifying the execution options. Acceptable options include: shots, qubit_lo_freq, meas_lo_freq, schedule_los, rep_delay, init_qubits, and use_measure_esp.

values.description: Estimated expectation values <Ψ|H|Ψ>. This is a numpy array. The i-th element is calculated using the circuit and observable indexed by the i-th circuit_indices and i-th observable_indices, and bound with i-th parameter_values.
